page.title: 12THE LYME REGIS TOWN BAND
page.content: The colours of the town's band are a red jacket, white shirt, black trousers,shoes and tie.The conductor is called Joe O'Donnell. The band has its practice on Tuesdays and Thursdays and in the summer they play on the front. They have got a variety of instruments ranging from a Cornet to a set of Drums. They are better than most bands and they play interesting music. At Christmas they have a concert and play carols all over Lyme Regis collecting for new instruments and equipment. The quality of the band's playing is very good. One of the best cornet players is called Simon Brooks, a student at Woodroffe School.
